mapper.select: select r.r_id, r.r_remark, r.r_time, r.r_price, r.car_user_tel, r.car_user_name, r.r_status, u.u_id, u.u_name, g.g_id, g.g_name from repair_info r left join user_info u on r.u_id = u.u_id left join goods_info g on r.g_id = g.g_id ORDER BY r.r_time desc

select r.r_id, r.r_remark, r.r_time, r.r_price, r.car_user_tel, r.car_user_name, r.r_status, u.u_id, u.u_name, g.g_id, g.g_name from repair_info r left join user_info u on r.u_id = u.u_id left join goods_info g on r.g_id = g.g_id where r.r_id = #{rid}
mapper.insert: insert into repair_info(r_id, r_remark, r_time, r_price, r_status, car_user_name, car_user_tel, g_id, u_id) values(#{rid}, #{remarks}, #{rtime}, #{price}, #{status}, #{carUserName}, #{carUserTel}, #{goods.gid}, #{user.uid})
mapper.update: update repair_info set r_status = #{status}, r_price = #{price} where r_id = #{rid}
